post.author: 김성욱
post.content:
Hi Brendan,
Thanks for taking the time to chat with me this morning!
I would be happy to speak with any referrals you may have for the “Build Master” role coming available.
Let me know if anyone in your network may be interested? I will be sure to keep an eye out for roles coming up for you in August,
Thanks again and speak to you soon,
-KP
Client- Scotiabank
Contract- 3 Months to start
Location- Downtown Toronto
Our client in the financial services requires a Build Master, who will be responsible for baseline, build and deploy management of web-based multi-tier applications using Rational ClearCase. Technical Environment; Clearcase, Java, J-Unit, Websphere, Web Services, Sybase.
Specific Responsibilities: -Communicate daily with QA project managers and developers for daily status meetings -deploying releases and patches to various environments, code management, and issue resolution -Take ownership of any build and deployment issues and ensure they are resolved in a timely manner -Create and maintain current software configuration management plan documents for applications under source control -Capture / analyze / negotiate / clarify requirements used to build software configuration management plans -Support projects by providing baseline, build, and deploy management services. Participate in / lead team meetings -Participate in the creation and execution of technical project and / or implementation plans -Produce and maintain relevant solution
Katie Pagett | Technical Recruiter 150 York Street, Suite 1206, Toronto, Ontario, M5H 3S5 PH 416.342.5025 | TF 877.342.5004 MB 647.378.3005 | FX 416.342.5070
post.title: Build Manager, Scotiabank, 3mths+, Cont'
